content: Screw magazine SD-M 1 02 ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hassle-free – minimized jamming and lost screws due to the optimized strip feed system Much faster than single screws – for higher productivity and less interruption due to re-loading Designed to be easy to use, reliable and convenient Compact and lightweight screwdriver magazine with only low contact pressure required – improving ergonomics to help reduce user fatigue Quick transition from collated to single screws with a simple click – no tools needed Applications Repetitive fastening of drywall boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 35 mm Repetitive fastening of wood boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 35 mm Repetitive fastening of exterior sheathing boards to metal or wood substructures with collated screws from 25 to 35 mm Compatible with Driver bit S-SY PH2 81/3 1/4 (5) #2039290 and Driver bit S-SY PH2 81/3 1/4 (10) #2039291 ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 6 in Magazine capacity: 40 Screw length - min: 0.98 in Technical Data | Length | 6 in | Magazine capacity | 40 | Screw length - min | 0.98 in | Screw length - max | 1.38 in | Weight | 0.6 lb ### ITEMS- 2208484 - Screw magazine SD-M 1 02 - Package Size 1 pc
